channel.title: I can't drink potions at all?
channel.description:
Hey guys, I am using Aggroth V2 as a base, and I have gotten very far. However, there is one fatal flaw. I cannot drink potions at all! In fact there are no packets being sent to the client. I can't show you the code now because I don't know what the problem might be. However, whatever you suspect the problem might be, I will happily give you the code for. Please help me, I am panicking right now. Thank you guys!
Sincerely,
LunarParadise

item.title: I can't drink potions at all?
item.dc:creator: @LunarParadise LunarParadise
item.description:
@LunarParadise wrote:

Null Amount:

So potions were already broken when you downloaded the source or did you recently make a “good change” to the server and it is now faulty?

No, potions were originally broken. Btw, I am using Aggroth V2, and I have not touched any Potions files AT ALL. But it might be in the clickitem class, because that’s where the potion drinking lies, etc.

Sincerely,

LunarParadise

Read full topic
item.source: I can't drink potions at all?

item.title: I can't drink potions at all?
item.dc:creator: @LunarParadise LunarParadise
item.description:
@LunarParadise wrote:

And when I first got the server it was like that. However after making MANY good changes to the server, this just popped up and now it’s frustrating! But I can eat food, etc. I tried taking my potions.java file from my other server and putting it on there, and still nothing, so it’s not something with the Potion.java it’s something else.

Sincerely,

LunarParadise

Read full topic
item.source: I can't drink potions at all?

item.title: I can't drink potions at all?
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

Null Amount:

Can you eat food? Also, what was the last thing you were working on that was related to consumables?

I CAN’T EAT FOOD EITHER. I get fed from a feeder

OT: Uhm, try making your own system for it (enum-based, forId, static, blah).

Read full topic
